name: Flutter: Starlight
description:
From the makers of the relaxing garden butterfly game, Flutter: Butterfly Sanctuary!

Collect flowers and raise moths in the peaceful calm of nature, under the light of the moon. Moths are just as beautiful as any butterfly!

COLLECT THEM ALL
Love nature games, plant games and garden games? Collect flowers while you discover and raise over 200 cute moths! Care for each moth in your relaxing garden as you enjoy calming nature sounds. All the moths are different sizes, colors, and have unique wing patterns, all based on real world species!

MOON LIT GARDEN MEDITATION
Butterfly games are beautiful, and the night time mode in Starlight takes the relaxing gameplay and makes it feel like a meditation game. If you’re looking for stress relief, or something to calm your anxiety, this relaxing game full of calming sounds may help. We have many emails from players saying this calming game helps with stress relief - we hope it helps you, too!

NIGHT BUTTERFLIES!
Raise and fly your moths between flowers in your beautiful garden by moon light! Each moth has a unique caterpillar and behaviours, just like in butterfly games. If you like garden games, relaxing games and calming nature sounds, we think you’ll love this!

COLLECT REAL FLOWERS
Grow and collect real, colorful flowers and mushrooms to decorate your environment in this plant game. Every flower is a real-life plant species and is beautifully drawn to match the real flower!

CALMING SOUNDS
Listen to calming sounds as you play - Flutter:Starlight is like a meditation game! Relax and experience this calming plant game full of nature sounds.

If you love garden games, calming games, butterfly games and flowers or are searching for some stress relief or a game that feels like meditation - Flutter: Starlight is for you.

At Runaway we are proud to make calming, relaxing games. We hope you enjoy them, and if you need us for anything please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at support@runawayplay.com
